Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/shape

Function Figure shape(list[Vertex] points, FProperty props...)
Description A shape is defined by a list of points, each point is a vertex and contains and x and a y coordinate. All coordinates are relative to the left/bottom corner of the shape. The left bottom corner also acts as anchor point for the shape. This makes it easy to overlay different shapes.

The following properties are relevent for shapes:
  • shapeConnected: connects the points with a straight line.
  • shapeClosed: implies shapeConnected and closes the area below the shape.
  • shapeCurved: implies shapeConnected and connects the points by fitting a Bezier curve through the points.
Examples //points = [<10, 50>, <60, 100>, <110, 60>, <160, 150>]; //vertices = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse(size(10), fillColor("Red"))) | <- points ]; //s = shape(vertices); //render(s);

//points = [<10, 50>, <60, 100>, <110, 60>, <160, 150>]; //vertices = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse(size(10), fillColor("Red"))) | <- points ]; //s = shape(vertices, shapeConnected()); //render(s);

//points = [<10, 50>, <60, 100>, <110, 60>, <160, 150>]; //vertices = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse(size(10), fillColor("Red"))) | <- points ]; //s = shape(vertices, shapeClosed(), fillColor("LightCoral")); //render(s);

//points = [<10, 50>, <60, 100>, <110, 60>, <160, 150>]; //vertices = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse(size(10), fillColor("Red"))) | <- points ]; //s = shape(vertices, shapeCurved()); //render(s);

//points = [<10, 50>, <60, 100>, <110, 60>, <160, 150>]; //vertices = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse(size(10), fillColor("Red"))) | <- points ]; //s = shape(vertices, shapeCurved(), shapeClosed(), fillColor("LightCoral")); //render(s);

/* points1 = [<10, 50>, <60, 100>, <110, 60>, <160, 150>]; vertices1 = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse(size(10), fillColor("Red"))) | <- points1 ]; s1 = shape(vertices1, shapeCurved(), shapeClosed(), fillColor(color("LightCoral", 0.5)), lineColor("Red")); points2 = [<10, 130>, <60, 50>, <110, 120>, <160, 100>]; vertices2 = [ vertex(x, y, ellipse([size(10), fillColor("Green")])) | <- points2 ]; s2 = shape(vertices2, shapeCurved(), shapeClosed(), fillColor(color("LightGreen", 0.5)), lineColor("Green")); render(overlay([s1, s2]));
  • /
